The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 15 February is 217,403 (25,057 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 10 February, there were 8,240 new confirmed cases (949.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 03 February, there were 10,482 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 21% (2,242 fewer cases).
